definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: I want a cup of cappuccino and a doughnut.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一杯卡布奇諾和一個甜甜圈。

sentences.english: A Single Cappuccino is a delicious coffee drink that's easy to make.
sentences.chinese: 一個單卡布奇諾是一種美味的咖啡飲料，很容易使。

sentences.english: Latte and cappuccino are both come from Italy, both mixed with coffee and mike.
sentences.chinese: 拿鐵和卡布奇諾都是來自意大利的咖啡。

sentences.english: A latte typically contains more milk than a cappuccino.
sentences.chinese: 通常一杯拿鐵比卡布奇諾含有更多的牛奶。

sentences.english: I know Cappuccino is your favorite.
sentences.chinese: 我知道卡布奇諾是你的最愛。

sentences.english: Cappuccino scuro: Cappuccino prepared with less milk than usual.
sentences.chinese: 比卡布奇諾用比平時少的奶來精製。

sentences.english: A Double Cappuccino is a delicious coffee drink that's easy to make.
sentences.chinese: 一個雙卡布奇諾是一種美味的咖啡飲料，很容易使。

sentences.english: How many cappuccinos did you sell?
sentences.chinese: 你們今天賣出多少杯卡布奇諾？

definition: to reconstitute (a powdered beverage) by adding water, milk etc
(bird species of China) black kite (Milvus migrans)
hot pot containing stinky tofu and other ingredients (Taiwanese dish)
